text: The service here is terrible! Run by kids. Either the food takes hours to make or orders are not made at all! After multiple attempts and receiving the same poor service every time, I finally gave up going all together. Never again!

text: Although I visit only once a month, I receive excellent service; get what I want on my pizza. My wings are always served hot!
